segments.text: Yes , I have . I think that I've hurt my back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Try and stand up . Can you stand up ? Here . Let me help you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Lucy . I'm afraid that I can't get up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that the doctor had better see you . I'll telephone Dr Carter . The doctor says that he will come at once . I'm sure that you need an X-ray , Andy .
segments.speaker: S2
